```html

Text Revealing Animation

``` ```css .animate-text { opacity: 0; animation: reveal 0.5s var(--i) ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes reveal { to { opacity: 1; } } ``` ```js const text = document.querySelector("h1"); text.innerHTML = text.textContent.replace( /\S/g, (char, index) => `${char}` ); ```
